name: perfect chocolate chip cookies
directions: Preheat oven to 375℉. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a bowl, add flour, baking soda and salt and mix well.
In another bowl, whisk melted butter, brown sugar and granulated sugar until well combined.
Add egg and vanilla and mix.
Add in the dry ingredients and fold until there is only some flour visible.
Add chocolate chips and fold until no more flour is visible. Chill for at least an hour.
Scoop dough onto the baking sheet, about 1.5 tbsp per cookie, spaced about 2 inches apart.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
Allow to cool on the pan for at least 5 minutes, it will continue baking.
Enjoy with a glass of milk!
